title: Gulf Islands National Seashore: Outdoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities              Outdoor Activities         Gulf Islands National Seashore is a perfect place to spend the day outside. NPS Photo  Whether you visit the Seashore for a day or a week there are many activities and places to explore.  Each of the seashore's many areas in Florida and Mississippi offer unique experiences for these activities. Activities: Beach Combing Bicycling Bird Watching Boating Camping Fishing Hiking Snorkeling Swimming Wildlife Viewing
